Name: Lawnmower Game
About the game: Introduction Lanwmover game where player drive lawnmower and cut grass in big open world which contain grass, houses and other obstacles Gameplay Drive lawnmover in open world and only job is to cut every cuttable grass in open world. After cutting all grass, it will respawn. Lawnmover has also fuel consumption. Pick-up Jerry cans and add fuel. After fuel is empty player will respawn to start location There is score system that player can get score with any grass player has cutted. Enjoy the game, cut all grass and be the lawnmower king......
